pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tree-Structured Modelling of Varying Coefficients // Fitting tree-structured varying coefficient models (Berger, M., Tutz, G. Schmid, M. (2018) doi:10.1007/s11222-018-9804-8). Simultaneous detection of covariates with varying coefficients and effect modifiers that induce varying coefficients if they are present.
